meta.title: Golf Leaderboard - PGA Championship
meta.description: Golf Leaderboard including current leaderboard and round scores

tournament_object.type: String - Stroke Play or Match Play - determines how to display leaderboard results.
tournament_object.name: String

live_details.total_rounds: Integer - total number of rounds in competition

leaderboard_array.position: Integer - ignore if 0, position in tournament
leaderboard_array.status: String - active, cut, retired, wd=withdrawn, dsq=disqualified
leaderboard_array.strokes: Integer - total strokes across all rounds - updated on completion of each round, default = 0
leaderboard_array.ranking_points: String - ranking points won for this competition
leaderboard_array.total_to_par: String - player score over all rounds completed

rounds_array.course_number: Integer - course to which round relates
rounds_array.tee_time_local: String - tee time in tournament timezone
